summary: Makes some changes in Lydia like posture,hair and clothing.
descriptionHtml:
I made ​​this simple mod just to give Lydia a better appearance and great acceptability of clothing. I removed the default clothing then you will have to add new clothing and equip Them Otherwise she will be naked because she will not rezet the defalt inventory.

 Important: 
 Install the mod after Lydia appear and use the command line \"resurrect\" to apply all changes


Version 3.0
the file now contains two styles of hair, long hair and ponytail
change some attributes to make her a little stronger
_____________________________________________________________________________________
Version 1.2.1.

 Corrected a few bugs but it is important that you install the mod after Lydia appear and use the command line \"resurrect\" to apply all changes
 I changed the style of her hair
 Lydia becomes essential
_____________________________________________________________________________________


  This mod requires:
   My Type of Hair falls off cliff by Meister 1.4 <http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=6173>

 For best results:
 Better Females by Bella by BellaGail
 Covereyes by mrLenski
 Calientes Female Body-Mod Big Bottom Edition CBBE-by Caliente
 
 These clothes are:
 Triss Armor retextured by Psyke23 and oldholo
 41 HQ Nocturnal Robes - Astrid - CBBE - UNP by Zonzai


  extract the files to the Data folder
  Be sure to check on HousecarlWhiterun DATA FILES
  play

 Credits:
 Skyrim NPC Editor by foretrenty
 Triss Armor retextured by Psyke23 and oldholo
 41 HQ Nocturnal Robes - Astrid - CBBE - UNP by Zonzai

 I hope you like
 sorry my bad english!
author: Thiagodepaula
